Objects.Name: Sun
Objects.Description: It''s our solar systems star!

Objects.Name: Banana
Objects.Description: Sammy's favourite snack!

Objects.Name: Penguin
Objects.Description: A short flightless bird, they make their nests out of stones, that sounds uncomfortable!

Objects.Name: Lump of coal
Objects.Description: This is what kids who dont listen to mommy and daddy get for Christmas!

Objects.Name: Hockey puck
Objects.Description: You can shoot this into the net for a goal. Sammy scores!

Objects.Name: Winter hat
Objects.Description: Protects your ears when its chilly outside!

Objects.Name: Basketball
Objects.Description: You shoot it into the basket!

Objects.Name: Tiger
Objects.Description: Animal that loves to hide in the jungle

Objects.Name: A cup of orange juice
Objects.Description: Sammy loves a big cup of this stuff, so tasty

Objects.Name: Cardinal
Objects.Description: You might see one fly by the front window!

Objects.Name: Rose
Objects.Description: Pretty flower that mommy hates!

Objects.Name: Apple
Objects.Description: You love to snatch these off the counter, you rascal!

Objects.Name: Lightning McQueen
Objects.Description: Float like a Cadillac, sting like a Beemer.!

Objects.Name: Lego Steam Train
Objects.Description: Just like the one that you play with in the basement. Toot toot!

Objects.Name: Dirt
Objects.Description: Love to dig in this stuff!

Objects.Name: Chocolate
Objects.Description: Mmmm messy but sooo tasty!

Objects.Name: Bo
Objects.Description: Our grumpy dog with little legs!

Objects.Name: Piece of toast
Objects.Description: Sammy loves to eat this with peanut butter and jam!

Objects.Name: Blue Jay
Objects.Description: A lovely bird that eats peanuts, weird!

Objects.Name: Sky
Objects.Description: Where the clouds live!

Objects.Name: Ocean
Objects.Description: This is where the sharks and wales live!

Objects.Name: Flower
Objects.Description: Some generic purple flower, there are lots of them!

Objects.Name: Barney the Dinosaur
Objects.Description: A favourite show from when mommy and daddy were little!

Objects.Name: Eggplant
Objects.Description: You can make pizza our of this somehow!

Objects.Name: Pig
Objects.Description: Oink! Oink! Where bacon comes from!

Objects.Name: Sprinkled Donut
Objects.Description: Daddy's favourite treat!

Objects.Name: Flamingo
Objects.Description: Weird bird that stands on one leg!

Objects.Name: Cotton candy
Objects.Description: A treat that looks like a fluffy cloud!

Objects.Name: Tree
Objects.Description: Are nice and tall, also where the birds live!

Objects.Name: Grass
Objects.Description: A fun place to roll around and play!

Objects.Name: Lime
Objects.Description: Super yummy to put on guacamole!

Objects.Name: Cucumber
Objects.Description: Sammy eats one of these every supper!

Objects.Name: Garbage Truck
Objects.Description: It comes every Monday morning and sometimes honks at you!
